CompanyName.value: Zapp Electric Vehicles Group Limited Ordinary Shares

Address.label: Address
Address.value: CAPITAL TOWER,26TH FLOOR 87/1 WIRELESS ROAD, HETHEL, United Kingdom

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Zapp Electric Vehicles Group Limited is a United Kingdom-based electric motorcycle company. The Company designs, manufactures, and sells high performance electric vehicles. Its debut product, the i300, is an urban electric high-performance two-wheeler capable of traditional motorcycle levels of performance in a step-through format, combining ease of use with exhilaration and fun. Its models include the i300 Carbon Launch Edition, i300 Carbon, i300 Bio, and i300 Ocean. The Company plans to offer a direct-to-customer experience known as drop-ship-direct-to-customer (DSDTC). Customers ordering the i300 online have their bikes conveniently delivered to their homes by Zappers, who provides at-home inspection, service, and support throughout the vehicle ownership lifecycle. The Company operates through its subsidiaries, Zapp Electric Vehicles Inc. and Zapp Electric Vehicles Limited.
